This mode oi examining the forms of a lan- guage is now made part of the education of boys in most schools where Latin is taught well. lt is one of the great aids towards lsying a sound knowledge of the form and meaning of words, and consequently it is essential towards a “right choice of words.'' The system of crude forms is fully explained in Professor Key's excellent Latin Grammar.
